title: Silver Oak Wine Dinner
description:
Take a seat this intimate wine dinner featuring a variety of Silver Oak wines perfectly paired with five decadent courses prepared by Chef Chris Saye. This evening in Prospect Lounge starts at 7pm on January 25th and is $135 per person.

View Menu >

 

MENU
1st
Patelin de Tablas Blanc, 2016, Paso Robles
Taleggio Crostini
orange-apricot jam, toasted pistachio, melba toast

2nd
Esprit de Tablas Blanc, 2015, Adelaida District, Paso Robles
Alaskan Halibut Crudo
kumquats, cucumber, pink peppercorn, cilantro, ponzu

3rd
Patelin de Tablas, 2015, Paso Robles
Grilled Forest Mushrooms
spiced duck confit, duck egg hollandaise, puff pastry, chervil

4th
Esprit de Tablas, 2015, Adelaida District, Paso Robles
Grilled Prime Striploin
braised oxtail, roasted root vegetables, moody blue mornay

5th
Vin de Paille ‘Sacrerouge’ Mourvedre 2014 Adelaida District Paso Robles
Maple Walnut Tart brown butter gelato
